Posts.EditableText: Hi, I was wondering if anyone could clue me in on how to progress in the quest game called: ''I rescued Elvis from communist alien jerks'' So far, I managed to get up to the point where I find ''fuel pellets'' and ''power cells''. But I can't seem to think of how to get past that point. Posting a comment on the game has not helped, it's been there over a month, and no further comments have been made. Could someone give me a clue on what to do next? EDIT: This game: http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review.php?game=59
